FoundDescriptions.Item2: There are some keys on the ground here.

Name: Keys
Description: It's a large metal ring with a bunch of keys on it.

FoundDescriptions.Item2: There is a shiny brass lamp nearby.
There is a lamp shining nearby.

The lamp is brass and highly polished. There is a switch on it labeled 'On/Off', which is currently in the 'On' position.

Description: The lamp is brass and highly polished. There is a switch on it labeled 'On/Off'.

It's a small wicker cage with a little bird inside.

The rod is about three feet long and black. It has a rusty mark on one end.

Description: The rod is about three feet long and black.
